hero.title: Program Lineup
hero.subtitle: A passionate web developer crafting beautiful and functional digital experiences

story.title: Why 'Amayadori' (Taking Shelter from Rain)?
story.description1: When caught in sudden rain, the time spent taking shelter under an eave is special. Like the proverb 'slow and steady wins the race,' stopping for a moment brings new discoveries.
story.description2: This podcast is the same. While being chased by daily development work, we stop for a moment to share technical talks and daily insights. We want to be such a warm place.

profile.title: KKeeth's Profile
profile.description1: For 10 years since stepping into the world of web development, I have walked alongside technological progress. As the host of 'Amayadori to WEB no Kobanashi,' I started the program with the desire to make technology more accessible and enjoyable to share.
profile.description2: With extensive experience from frontend to backend, I currently work as a full-stack developer. I cherish the warm atmosphere of chatting with friends over coffee.

webdev.title: Into Web Development
webdev.description: Studied computer science in university and first touched HTML and CSS.

frontend.title: Frontend Specialization
frontend.description: Learned React and Vue.js, diving deep into modern frontend development.

fullstack.title: Full-Stack Developer
fullstack.description: Learned Node.js and database design, started working as a full-stack developer.

podcast.title: Podcast Launch
podcast.description: Started 'Amayadori to WEB no Kobanashi.' Sharing technical knowledge with many people.

community.title: Community Growth
community.description: Listener community grew and expanded into various programs.

profile.philosophy: I believe in the power of technology to transform lives and make the world a better place. I am passionate about creating digital experiences that are not only beautiful but also functional and user-friendly. I am constantly learning and evolving to stay ahead in the fast-paced world of web development.

program.title: Program Lineup
program.description:
Each has a different theme and style to suit your interests.
All programs offer a pleasant dialogue.

contact.title: CONTACT
contact.subtitle: Let's Connect
contact.message: Feel free to reach out for job requests or consultations.

hero.title: Shall we chat while taking shelter from the rain?
hero.subtitle:
Like a warm conversation you might have under an eave when caught in sudden rain
Feel free to reach out about anything

contact.description:
Questions, feedback, tech talks, collaboration invitations, and more -
I'm waiting for anything. While listening to the sound of rain,
let's have a relaxed conversation.

notFound.title: Looks like you've lost your way
notFound.message: From the shelter of this eave, please return to the original path
